header.title: Best Paper Award
header.description: Explore the outstanding papers selected from each technical track, honored for their excellence in research, innovation, and presentation. These awards highlight the top contributions that have made a significant impact within their respective domains.

list.title: Best Paper Award (Overall)
list.description: Awarded to the most outstanding paper across all tracks.

list.title: Best Paper Award (Track-wise)
list.description: One best paper will be selected from each of the 6 research tracks.

list.title: Best Student Paper Award
list.description: Recognizing exceptional work where the primary author is a student.

criteria.title: Selection Criteria
list: Originality and innovation of the research work.
Technical soundness and clarity of presentation.
Relevance to the conference tracks and themes.
Significance of the results and contribution to the field.
Quality of the presentation during the conference.

process.title: Selection Process
steps: Initial screening by the Program Committee based on reviewer scores.
Shortlisting of top-rated papers from each track.
Evaluation by a dedicated Best Paper Award Committee during the conference presentation.
Final decision based on both the written paper and the oral presentation.

note: The decision of the Best Paper Award Committee is final and binding. Winners will be announced during the valedictory ceremony.
